text:
See the following page that has lots of text that uses the fixed pitch font provided by the tag. http://ant.apache.org/manual/CoreTypes/selectors.html The first sentence seems to be the offender:

Selectors are a mechanism whereby the files that make up a fileset<depend> can be selected based on criteria other than filename as provided by the <include> and <exclude> tags.

I think this is what was intended:

Selectors are a mechanism whereby the files that make up a fileset <depend> can be selected based on criteria other than filename as provided by the <include> and <exclude> tags.
creator: sarcher@us.ibm.com
peterreilly@apache.org
text:
Hi this is already fixed in SVN.
Thanks for the report.
